alert.note: Alert for Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 8:01AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Gunnison River Valley. The heaviest snow is expected heading up to and including Cerro Summit. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Expect slick and snowy roads. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
